data.eml:eml: New records of Black Fungus Gnats (Diptera: Sciaridae) from New Caledonia, with the description of two new Bradysia species and an updated checklist

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Köhler, Arne, Menzel, Frank (2013): New records of Black Fungus Gnats (Diptera: Sciaridae) from New Caledonia, with the description of two new Bradysia species and an updated checklist. Zootaxa 3718 (1): 63-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.1.5
